thread.title: DOLLY PARTON : FAITH Gives Me Hope
thread.title_full: DOLLY PARTON : FAITH Gives Me Hope

author: Magzter
title: DOLLY PARTON : FAITH Gives Me Hope
text: When did we lose 'in God we trust?" asks Dolly ParW ton in "World on Fire," the kickoff single from her chart-topping new album, Rockstar. In the song, the country music queen takes aim at greedy politicians, hatred, and violence, and suggests that we all need to be a lot kinder to each other. "Show some love," she sings. "Let's rise above." Dolly, 77, admits she's not much of a churchgoer, but she is a big believer in God, especially in these troubled times. This story is from the January 08, 2024 edition of Closer US. Start your 7-day Magzter GOLD free trial to access thousands of curated premium stories, and 8,000+ magazines and newspapers.
